alert.note: Alert for Pearl River (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued February 03 at 11:30AM CST until February 03 at 12:00PM CST by NWS New Orleans
info.description: The National Weather Service in New Orleans has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Pearl River County in southern Mississippi... * Until noon CST. * At 1130 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles southwest of Lumberton, or 8 miles north of Poplarville, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Poplarville. This includes Interstate 59 in Mississippi between mile markers 31 and 42. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Large hail and damaging winds and continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
